api.basic.init_simulation(fsettings, fschedule, ftemplate)¶

Initialization of eflips.depot.simulation.SimulationHost

Parameters:

  • fsettings (str) – Path of setting file (JSON)

  • fschedule (str) – Path of bus-schedule file (XML)

  • ftemplate (str) – Path of template file (JSON)

Returns:

A eflips.depot.simulation.SimulationHost

Return type:

eflips.depot.simulation.SimulationHost

api.basic.run_simulation(simulation_host)¶

Run simulation and return simulation results

Parameters:

simulation_host (eflips.depot.Simulation.SimulationHost) – Simulation Host of eflips-depot

Returns:

Object of eflips.depot.Simulation.SimulationHost storing simulation results

Return type:

eflips.depot.Simulation.SimulationHost

api.basic.to_simba(ev)¶

Returns a list containing input data for simba

Parameters:

ev (eflips.depot.evaluation.DepotEvaluation) – Object storing all simulation results

Returns:

list of InputForSimba

Return type:

list

class api.basic.InputForSimba¶

Input Data for Simba

Parameters:

  • rotation_id (int) – ID of rotation

  • vehicle_id (str) – ID of vehicle

  • soc_departure (float) – soc at departure of each vehicle
